name: @twuni/measured
description: Transparently measure the execution time of an asynchronous function.

scripts.build: rm -vfR lib && babel --only '**/index.js' --no-comments --compact true --minified --source-maps false --out-dir lib src; cp -vfR package.json package-lock.json yarn.lock README.md LICENSE.md lib/
scripts.documentation: rm -fR docs; (cd src; find . -type f -name index.js | xargs jsdoc --destination ../docs --package ../package.json --readme ../README.md)
